query:
-- Contar testes que estão apenas em psychometricTests
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_psychometric,
  SUM(CASE WHEN tr.id IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_in_testResults,
  SUM(CASE WHEN tr.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as exists_in_testResults
FROM psychometricTests pt
LEFT JOIN testResults tr ON tr.employeeId = pt.employeeId AND tr.testType = pt.testType
WHERE pt.completedAt IS NOT NULL;

  SUM(CASE WHEN tr.id IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_in_testResults,
  SUM(CASE WHEN tr.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as exists_in_testResults
FROM psychometricTests pt
LEFT JOIN testResults tr ON tr.employeeId = pt.employeeId AND tr.testType = pt.testType
WHERE pt.completedAt IS NOT NULL;
